chat: TTao: Problem: (unset). Let's keep it green and simple.
Thread Sovereign: Run hive:daily and fill Board; commit one safe improvement (e.g., overview/standardize turn) (Win: dup==0 && smoke:pass && frozen:pass && miss==0)
Faultline Seeker: Design 1–3 micro-tests for riskiest assumption in Board; run replay on a new short trace (Stop: Stop rule hit (signal or timeout) on at least one probe)
Prism Magus: Run prism_reframe.mjs with goal from Board to compare baseline vs new angle (Keep when EV_new > EV_old within constraints; no regressions)
Web Cartographer: Adopt ports/adapters for the next seam; land the smallest first step

Help: Ask anything. Controls — tone=casual|formal, rounds=1|2, --strict, --council, --provider

, seed=. Private: sovereign decide | prism plan. Edit BOARD.current.txt to steer.

exploit.persona: I cut indecision; we move one safe step.

explore.persona: I probe the crack that breaks assumptions fastest.

pivot.persona: I change the path, not the goal; I turn complicated into constrained.

reorient.persona: I reveal the map so we can choose a better path.
